description: The L'Escapade trail system in Rigaud contrary to popular belief is not open tp mountain biking. The provincial police along with municipal patrollers are authorised to give out $300.00 fines....the trails are open year long, free of charge to cross country skiing, snowshoeing, walking and horseback riding only.
directions: Take Hwy 40 to exit 17, or exit 12. Go to Mtee Grande Ligne to rue Page. (downtown Rigaud)Enter the parking lot at Parc Chartier de Lobiniere.Go to the chalet.The entrance to the trails is to the side of the chalet.
title: L'escapade
